CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 12 reads: " More Queen Contestants - Another group of Pittsburgh teen-agers who are clamoring to wear the crown of Hill City Queen includes, left to right,...Betty Reeves...Harris Photos."Cutline of image published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 13, 1954, pg. 12 reads: " Hill City Contestants For Queen - Among the organizations sponsoring some of these lovely young teenagers, who are striving to wear the Hill City Queen's crown at the may Coronation Ball, are Alpha Alpha Omega Chapter of AKA, Omicron Psi Chapter of Omega Fraternity, Hill City Women's Auxiliary, and Schenley Heights Neighborhood Club.  In this group are, left to right...Glotia Bey...-Harris Photos."Cutline of image published in the Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 8, 1954, pg. 12 reads: " Who Will Be Crowned Teen-Queen Friday Night?  Gloria Bey Still in Lead With 1,707 Votes - Gloria Bey"
TitMainTitle: Two frames: Portrait of Betty Reeves wearing dark long sleeved satin blouse with safety pin brooch on collar, posed in front of light colored background in Harris Studio for Hill City Teen Queen contest; Portrait of Glotia Bey wearing light colored long sleeved blouse and pendant, posed in front of light colored background in Harris Studio for Hill City Teen Queen contest
